title: Sri Lanka President acting as Finance Minister
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s President Gotabya Rajapaksa will be the acting Finance Minister until a new person is appointed, cabinet spokesperson Kanchana Wijesekera said.
Despite the ongoing IMF discussions and a fresh cabinet being appointed on Monday for the third time this year, the country is yet to appoint a finance minister.
The former Justice and Finance Minister Ali Sabry has been carrying on the IMF discussions in place of a Finance Minister. (Colombo/May24/2022)
